custom_fields.key_topics:
This course is about cultivating a safe and comfortable space to tackle social
injustices, like racism, sexism and other kinds of discrimination. It deals with
current issues faced by minorities and systematically oppressed groups.
custom_fields.assessment_structure: There will be mostly video resources, a mid-semester activity and final reflection project, as well as mini reflections post class
custom_fields.goals: Students will learn to acknowledge the different social issues at hand as well as understand how to continue having the important conversations that surround these issue
custom_fields.relevance: Along with the other platforms provided on campus, this course will be a different kind of space for students to learn and have fruitful discussions to learn about other people's struggles and confront our own biases
custom_fields.learning_resources: Students will be required watch tedtalks, short debates and a few movie documentaries.

long_desc: This course is about cultivating a safe and comfortable space to tackle social injustices, like racism, sexism and other kinds of discrimination. It deals with current issues faced by minorities and systematically oppressed groups. In a very diverse world, it is important for us to learn about other peoples struggles and confront our own biases. Along with the other platforms provided on campus, this course will be a different kind of space for students to learn and have fruitful discussions.
name: Join the Conversation: Tackling Social Injustices
